high_descs: Turn around 180 degrees then turn 90 degrees to the left and walk towards the other end of the room, turning 90 degrees to the left when you reach the bed.
Pick up the pillow on the bed.
Turn 90 degrees to the right to face the nightstand.
Turn on the lamp on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the light while holding a pillow.

high_descs: Turn around and walk until you're even with the nightstand to the right of the head of the bed then turn left and walk to it and turn left.
Pick up the pillow at the head of the bed.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a light as you hold a pillow.

high_descs: Turn around, take a step forward, turn left towards the lamp, and then turn left to face the bed.
Pick up the pillow closest to the head of the bed.
Turn right to face the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow at the light of a lamp.
